basic.description: This course is a continuation of ENT 2010, focusing on growing and exiting a business. Additional course content exposes students to the basics of entrepreneurial law, negotiation, and understanding financial statements.
basic.subject: ENT
basic.title: Managing and Harvesting New Ventures

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Admission to the major, ACG 2021, ENT 2010, and ENT 2010L. Corequisites: ACG 2071 and ENT 2011L.
